ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | submgmmgm.h | |- H = ( M |`s S ) |
| 2 |  | #P_submgmrcl | |- ( S e. ( SubMgm ` M ) -> M e. Mgm ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` M ) = ( Base ` M ) |
| 4 | 3, 1 | #P_issubmgm2 | |- ( M e. Mgm -> ( S e. ( SubMgm ` M ) <-> ( S C_ ( Base ` M ) /\ H e. Mgm ) ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( S e. ( SubMgm ` M ) -> ( S e. ( SubMgm ` M ) <-> ( S C_ ( Base ` M ) /\ H e. Mgm ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_ibi | |- ( S e. ( SubMgm ` M ) -> ( S C_ ( Base ` M ) /\ H e. Mgm ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_simprd | |- ( S e. ( SubMgm ` M ) -> H e. Mgm ) |
